company: INBlFO Institut für biologische Forschung GmbH
message: Dear Gerry: Please find following the latest data on ViRGO. The data are reliable, although they could not be checked by QA, as both, Dr. von Holt as well as Mr. Dax, are not in the institute today. Please distribute copies to those who are interested in the data. Best regards and have a nice weekend.
